definition: pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
surname Qin/Qin dynasty (221-207 BC) of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/abbr. for 陝西|陕西[Shan3 xi1]

sentences.english: Among the scholars in the pre-Qin period, Yang Zhu seems to be a mysterious figure.
sentences.chinese: 在先秦諸子中，楊朱似乎是一個神祕人物。

sentences.english: Here is an integrity of linguistic criticism during the time bef ore Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 從整體性論述先秦時期的語言批評。

sentences.english: 《Book of Changes》and the great thinkers of the pre-Qin period emphasize the ancient and contemporary significances.
sentences.chinese: 《周易》及先秦時代的重要思想家都注重古義和今義。

sentences.english: Water has its fountainhead and tree has its root. China traditional culture's basic is in Pre-qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 水有源，樹有根，中國傳統文化的根源在先秦。

sentences.english: Shortened words and expressions has been a universal phenomenon since the pre-Qin dynasty period.
sentences.chinese: 詞語簡縮是自先秦至現代漢語存在的一種普遍現象。

sentences.english: The research confirmed the glorious triumph of the lost-wax process in Pre-Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 這一研究再次驗證了先秦失蠟法的輝煌成就。

sentences.english: The history of mathematics in Pre-Qin China is the weakest domain in the study of the history of mathematics in China.
sentences.chinese: 先秦數學史一直是中國數學史研究的薄弱環節。

sentences.english: The thought of military law during Pre-Qin periods was showed military criminal law originated from clan war.
sentences.chinese: 先秦軍事法，最早表現爲部族戰爭中產生的軍事刑法。

sentences.english: The paper concluded that single-syllable adjectives may connect with object, especially in the Chinese prevailing in the early Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 筆者認爲先秦漢語單音節形容詞是可以帶賓語的。

sentences.english: The oceanography outlook of the Pre-Qin Perios is an integral part of ancient Chinese marine culture.
sentences.chinese: 先秦海洋觀念是中國古代海洋文化不可或缺的一環。

sentences.english: In the lost essays, there are two basic attitudes towards literature: affirmative us.
sentences.chinese: 在先秦佚文中，對文藝的基本態度有肯定和否定兩種。

sentences.english: It was inital and taking shape stage about the Peach culture before the Qin Dynasty and Wei Jin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 先秦至魏晉是桃文化的濫觴和形成期。

sentences.english: Fire played important role in life and production in Pre-qin Era.
sentences.chinese: 先秦時期，火在生活生產中都扮演着重要角色。

sentences.english: Before the Qin Dynasty, Zhouyi learning had already had considerable development.
sentences.chinese: 先秦《易》學已有了相當的發展。

sentences.english: Guiguzi or The Master of the Ghost Valley is a distinctive academic work of pre-Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《鬼谷子》是先秦時期很有特色的一部學術著作。

definition: the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods/Eastern Zhou (770-221 BC)
pinyin: Chun1 qiu1 Zhan4 guo2 Shi2 dai4

definition: Qin dynasty (221-207 BC), founded by the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2], the first dynasty to rule the whole of China
Xia, Shang and Zhou, the earliest named Chinese dynasties
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
the Qin (221-207 BC) and Han (206 BC-220 AD) dynasties
Western Han Dynasty (206 BC-8 AD), also called 前漢|前汉[Qian2 Han4], Former Han Dynasty
